Rockville.North Bethesda Trail:
The North Bethesda Trail, previously known as the "Bethesda Trolley Trail," is a 4.0-mile (6.4 km) long rail trail from the city of Rockville to Bethesda, Maryland. The North Bethesda Trail connects with the Bethesda Trolley Trail.
The trail runs on the abandoned right-of-way of the Tennallytown and Rockville Railroad, also known as the Washington and Rockville trolley.
